PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: servants to the Countess of Rousillon.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: COUNTESS OF ROUSILLON, mother to Bertram.
HELENA, a gentlewoman protected by the Countess.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: neighbours and friends to the Widow.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: Lords, Officers, Soldiers, c., French and Florentine.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter BERTRAM, the COUNTESS of Rousillon, HELENA, and LAFEU, all in black
